title: Step right up!
creator_credit: Mike Lloyd Ross, Ray Jewell and Film Communications
brief_description: Illustrates the possible hazards and improper procedures when using ladders. Shows the proper use of stepladders, straight ladders, and extension ladders. Also focuses on inspection, maintenance, carrying, ladder stances, erecting and securing, climbing and descending. Camera: Peter Good.
creator_credit_for_label: Mike Lloyd Ross, Ray Jewell and Film Communications
